title: Pressing Alt + Tab freezes my entire computer when league is running.
body: This problem started today and any time I try to alt+tab out of the game, it freezes my entire computer. I can't open up task messenger, I can't alt + F4. The only way to fix is to the force restart the computer by holding down the power button on my computer. Is there a fix to this problem? My video card Nvidia GTX 850M if that helps.

replies.body: Your PC might be going through too much stress while tasking out, which can get exasperated by your connection trying to catch you up on everything while away.  You can try running the game windowed or borderless, but I also recommend going over our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to help tune up your PC.  I hope that helps!
